content:
this is a single endpoint from an open api spec document
it has been minified by removing unnecessary kvps
additionally common terms have been abbreviated  operationId: GetNameserversForZone path: https://gateway.stackpath.com/dns/v1/stacks/{stack_id}/zones/{zone_id}/discover_nameservers content: params
name stackid
desc a stack id or slug
in path
required true
schema
type str
name zoneid
desc a dns zone id
in path
required true
schema
type str
sum get a zones nameservers
responses
200
zonegetnameserversforzoneresponse
type obj
props
configured
type bool
format bool
desc whether or not all required name servers are configured in the zone
currentnameservers
type str
desc the zones currently configured nameservers
requirednameservers
type str
desc the nameservers required in the zones configuration
desc a response from a request to retrieve information about a dns zones authoritative nameservers
title: 37_Zones_GetNameserversForZone_212.json
